**Mako-Class Missile Corvette**

**Description**

I have made a while back in **0.19**, it is the first battleship that successfully launched into **orbit**. ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

(But the new version kinda break my ship's launch, so it might take time to made it to be ready for **1.0**)

![UvE0Ihg.png](http://i.imgur.com/UvE0Ihg.png)

**Roles and Armaments**

Served as an **anti capital-ship missile corvette**, it could armed with either 4 **SRB** torpedoes for short range, or 4 **Guided Missile** for long range.

Inspired by **Macey's Vanguard** SRB torpedoes, the missiles could slice any capital-ship with ease. 

It also has **reloading** mechanism that could reload or change its armament using a refilling vessel.

**Crew Capacity**

Normally, the ship would have **3 crews** for **normal operation**, but it could consist of **6 crews** while **fully loaded.**

It has a **commanding bridge** on top of the ship with capacity of 2 crews and a **secondary bridge** at the bottom mainly used for communication.

Also, it is an **escape pod** that could contain **3 crews**, which could detach from the main ship while **emergency**.

**Propulsion**

Its propulsion system consists of 1 **"Skipper" Liquid Engine** for **combat** situation, and 6 **LV-N Atomic Rocket Motors** for **interplanetary travel**. It has about 4500m/s delta-v while fully refilled with LV-N engines.

![ZgZ6zXJ.png](http://i.imgur.com/ZgZ6zXJ.png)

**Please leave a** **comment** if you like it. I might share the craft after I have finished my **modification** to **1.0** ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

Also, I would demonstrate the **weapon system**, **refuelling** and **reloading** process on this post later. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
